ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed beef and mushroom soup

cookingTips: Add sour cream at the end to prevent curdling, stirring gently to combine
Heat on low for 2-3 hours to keep meatballs tender and warm
Serve over egg noodles or mashed potatoes for a complete meal
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to prepare easy slow cooker Swedish meatballs with a creamy sauce
